TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScaleGestureDetector extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Detects scaling transformation gestures using the supplied MotionEvents.

remarks.para:
Detects scaling transformation gestures using the supplied MotionEvents. The OnScaleGestureListener callback will notify users when a particular gesture event has occurred. This class should only be used with MotionEvents reported via touch. To use this class:
  • Create an instance of the ScaleGestureDetector for your View
  • In the View#onTouchEvent(MotionEvent) method ensure you call #onTouchEvent(MotionEvent). The methods defined in your callback will be executed when the events occur.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FocusX As Single
public: virtual property float FocusX { float get(); };

Docs.summary: Get the X coordinate of the current gesture's focal point.
Docs.value: X coordinate of the focal point in pixels.

remarks.para:
Get the X coordinate of the current gesture's focal point. If a gesture is in progress, the focal point is between each of the pointers forming the gesture.
If #isInProgress() would return false, the result of this function is undefined.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Function OnTouchEvent (e As MotionEvent) As Boolean
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnTouchEvent(class Android.Views.MotionEvent e) cil managed
abstract member OnTouchEvent : Android.Views.MotionEvent -> bool override this.OnTouchEvent : Android.Views.MotionEvent -> bool

Docs.summary: Accepts MotionEvents and dispatches events to a OnScaleGestureListener when appropriate.
Docs.returns: true if the event was processed and the detector wants to receive the rest of the MotionEvents in this event stream.

remarks.para: Accepts MotionEvents and dispatches events to a OnScaleGestureListener when appropriate.

Applications should pass a complete and consistent event stream to this method. A complete and consistent event stream involves all MotionEvents from the initial ACTION_DOWN to the final ACTION_UP or ACTION_CANCEL.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property QuickScaleEnabled As Boolean
public: virtual property bool QuickScaleEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public virtual bool QuickScaleEnabled { get; set; }
member this.QuickScaleEnabled : bool with get, set

Docs.param: true to enable quick scaling, false to disable
Docs.summary: Return whether the quick scale gesture, in which the user performs a double tap followed by a swipe, should perform scaling. -or- Set whether the associated OnScaleGestureListener should receive onScale callbacks when the user performs a doubleTap followed by a swipe.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Return whether the quick scale gesture, in which the user performs a double tap followed by a swipe, should perform scaling. #setQuickScaleEnabled(boolean).
Property setter documentation:

Set whether the associated OnScaleGestureListener should receive onScale callbacks when the user performs a doubleTap followed by a swipe. Note that this is enabled by default if the app targets API 19 and newer.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ScaleFactor As Single
public: virtual property float ScaleFactor { float get(); };

Docs.summary: Return the scaling factor from the previous scale event to the current event.

remarks.para: Return the scaling factor from the previous scale event to the current event. This value is defined as (#getCurrentSpan() / #getPreviousSpan()).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property StylusScaleEnabled As Boolean
public: virtual property bool StylusScaleEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
public virtual bool StylusScaleEnabled { get; set; }
member this.StylusScaleEnabled : bool with get, set

Docs.param: true to enable stylus scaling, false to disable.
Docs.summary: Return whether the stylus scale gesture, in which the user uses a stylus and presses the button, should perform scaling. -or- Sets whether the associates OnScaleGestureListener should receive onScale callbacks when the user uses a stylus and presses the button.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Return whether the stylus scale gesture, in which the user uses a stylus and presses the button, should perform scaling. #setStylusScaleEnabled(boolean)
Property setter documentation:

Sets whether the associates OnScaleGestureListener should receive onScale callbacks when the user uses a stylus and presses the button. Note that this is enabled by default if the app targets API 23 and newer.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
